document.full_text: john malone's liberty media corp  has proposed to buy barnes & noble inc  for $1.02 billion, nine months after the largest u.s. bookstore chain put itself up for sale.
document.title: liberty media offers $1 billion for barnes & noble
lines_and_colors: john malone's liberty media corp  has proposed to buy barnes & noble inc  for $1.02 billion, nine months after the largest u.s. bookstore chain put itself up for sale.
